bibl.title: Hellenistic Alexandria.
bibl.note: The distinction between the art of the court and the art of the street, attested in the corpus of minor arts, reflects a separation that was very real in Ptolemaic Alexandria.

bibl.title: Jaimee P. UHLENBROCK, with contributions by several authors, The Coroplast's Art. Greek Terracottas of the Hellenistic World. An Exhibition and Publication in Honor of Dorothy Burr Thompson

bibl.seg: Jaimee P. UHLENBROCK, with contributions by several authors, The Coroplast's Art. Greek Terracottas of the Hellenistic World. An Exhibition and Publication in Honor of Dorothy Burr Thompson (New Rochelle - New York, 1990) pp. 89-92, 1 fig.
The distinction between the art of the court and the art of the street, attested in the corpus of minor arts, reflects a separation that was very real in Ptolemaic Alexandria.
